greggjc wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi There,
> 
> Is there a way to populate the Test Class Name dropdown when first
> starting up the Junit Swing GUI?  Also, this drop down seems to
> remember class names I have tested, where is this info stored and is
> there a way to remove it? (I am running on Windows XP).

Search your file system for files like junit*.properties. I believe that 
file stores the current values in that dropdown box. Edit them at will.
--
